mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(company_name, company_category_id, created_at) VALUES(#{companyName}, #{companyCategoryId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.login_id, c.company_name, cd.company_phonenumber, cd.company_email, cd.company_picture, cd.company_address, ct.category_frontend, ct.category_backend, ct.category_devops FROM company c INNER JOIN company_detail cd ON c.company_id = cd.company_id INNER JOIN users u ON cd.company_id = u.company_id INNER JOIN category ct ON c.company_category_id = ct.category_id;
